paragraphs.1: Expresses its appreciation to the International Law Commission for its continuing contribution to the codification and progressive development of international law;
paragraphs.2: Takes note once again of the draft articles on prevention and punishment of crimes against humanity, presented by the Commission; 3
paragraphs.3: Decides to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-seventh session the item entitled “Crimes against humanity” and to continue to examine the recommendation of the Commission contained in paragraph 42 of its report on the work of its seventy-first session.
